name: A Valentine Experience
description:
Thanks for giving this little experience a try! It's a short one that only takes a few minutes of your day. But sometimes, a few minutes is all it takes to make a difference in someone's life. Let's all make a difference, for the better, in the lives of those around us no matter how great or small. ♥

To be honest, I didn't get a chance to start working on this until February 24th. I did as much as I could with my idea over the course of 4 days. It was difficult to still try to capture the essence of the game with just a single scenario but I'm hoping it still reaches those who play. In the future I plan on adding the 2 scenarios mentioned in game as well as a few others I had written up.

Wishing you all the love and kindness you deserve in life! ♥
